directions: Whisk together horseradish, mayonnaise, vinegar, salt, pepper, and oil in a large bowl. Add ham, grapes, celery, and chives and toss until coated.
ingredients: 1/2 lb thinly sliced ham, cut into 1/2-inch-wide strips (3 cups)
1/2 lb seedless green grapes, quartered lengthwise
3 celery ribs, strings removed and ribs sliced crosswise 1/4 inch thick
1 small head romaine, thinly sliced crosswise
title: Ham and Grape Salad with Horseradish Chive Vinaigrette
